data.title: Trevor Thompson Biography
data.meta_description: View the biography of Golden State Warriors Center Trevor Thompson on ESPN. Includes career history and teams played for.
data.text:
BAL probing player payment discrepancy at Cape Town Tigers

The Basketball Africa League (BAL) is probing the Cape Town Tigers over alleged fraudulent reporting of player payments in the 2023 season, a club director has told ESPN.

Frank Selvy, with record 100 points in NCAA game, dies at 91

Frank Selvy, who scored an NCAA Division I-record 100 points in a game at Furman and played nine NBA seasons, died Tuesday at 91.

2024 NBA in-season tournament: Format, schedule, groups

The full schedule of the NBA's second edition of the in-season tournament will be revealed Tuesday. Here's what you need to know.

Topps unveils rare LeBron, Curry, Durant-signed Paris Olympics card

As rare as it was for LeBron James, Stephen Curry and Kevin Durant to team up for a handful of games this summer, now there is a collectable commemorating their time together at the Paris Olympics that's even rarer.
